short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch every YouTube Shorts into normal YouTube video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired to see YouTube Shorts videos? Switch to the normal YouTube video view with this extension! When enabled, it will automatically switch the view from YouTube Shorts to a normal YouTube video.
